================================================================================
                    QUICK DEPLOYMENT CHECKLIST
================================================================================

Use this checklist when deploying to each Windows device.

================================================================================
PRE-DEPLOYMENT (Do once)
================================================================================

[ ] Copy entire 'dist' folder to USB drive / network share
[ ] Test PrintServer.exe works on your computer first
[ ] Note your printer model name (for verification)

================================================================================
ON EACH TARGET DEVICE (5 minutes per device)
================================================================================

STEP 1: COPY FILES
[ ] Copy entire dist folder to: C:\PrintServer
[ ] Verify sharp/ folder is present

STEP 2: INSTALL
[ ] Right-click DEPLOY_TO_DEVICE.bat
[ ] Select "Run as Administrator"
[ ] Choose installation method:
    [ ] Option 2: Auto-Start on Login (recommended for workstations)
    [ ] Option 3: Windows Service (recommended for servers)

STEP 3: VERIFY
[ ] Open browser: http://localhost:9191
[ ] Should see: "Print Service with Logo Support is running"
[ ] Check status: http://localhost:9191/status
[ ] Check printer listed: http://localhost:9191/printers
[ ] Test print: http://localhost:9191/test-print

STEP 4: FIREWALL (Only if network printing needed)
[ ] Windows Firewall prompt appears → Click "Allow"
[ ] OR manually configure port 9191

STEP 5: DOCUMENT
Device Name: _______________________
IP Address:  _______________________
Printer:     _______________________
Status:      [ ] Working  [ ] Issues: _______________

================================================================================
COMMON ISSUES
================================================================================

Issue: "Cannot find module 'sharp'"
Fix:   Ensure sharp/ folder is in C:\PrintServer

Issue: No printer found
Fix:   1. Check printer driver installed
       2. Visit /printers to see printer name
       3. If different from RP3160, needs rebuild

Issue: Can't run as admin
Fix:   Right-click → "Run as Administrator"

Issue: Firewall blocks
Fix:   Allow port 9191 in Windows Firewall

================================================================================
